title: House for sale in Raddolugama Housing Scheme
details: Two storied house in peaceful environment with decent neighbor hood. Located in Raddolugama housing scheme in Seeduwa. Easy access to banks , shopping , restaurants and groceries, etc.. 10 minutes to the airport can access to Colombo Negambo main road in 10 minutes. For more details Please contact Dushan. No brokers. Negotiable after inspection.
